Text: shouldnt this be in the tv shows section ?
I know...This happens when you upload with your eyes closed :)

is there anyway i could get rid of the russian dub(audio 1) and replace with English one(audio2)??Please help me~
I ve been looking for Bluray version of season1 and the files are really good in terms of bluray quality. but only the russian dub is the problme..
^^ it also has english audio..... & if you want to delete the russian audio track.. u can do it easily with mkvmerge
Amazing quality! Any idea if we'll be getting the other seasons in this quality too?

@john_korin:
Download MKVMerge like abhikrit wrote from here: http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/downloads.html
(Windows version direct link: http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/win32/mkvtoolnix-unicode-4.9.1-setup.exe )

Install and launch "mkvmerge GUI"

Click on "add" and select the episode you want to edit

Remove the checkboxes next to the tracks you want to remove

Click on "Start muxing" and wait for 30 seconds.

:) (Of course you can add files to a job queue and fix all files in one go if you want.)

@Tiny Turtle
I want to put subtitle in mkv file... Tell me what program can I use to do that?
what is the audio like? is it like a chinese movie where the lips move then the sound comes?
if I remove the russian audio, the english one will be the "default", right!?

You can set default Audio in "mkvmerge GUI"
